players
Class AI_AbstractPlayer

java.lang.Object
  players.AI_AbstractPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
PlayerInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
MinimaxPlayer, RandomPlayer, StrategicPlayer
public abstract class AI_AbstractPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements PlayerInterface

All Players that are controlled by the computer must extend this class. The algorithm determining the move must be written in calculateMove()
